title: The Web Developer Bootcamp (Colt Steele @Udemy.com)
description: This was the first developer course I took. I knew some HTML knowledge prior to this, but I learned CSS, basic *Javascript*, *Jquery*, *Bootstrap*, *Express* and more. I loved it, this course made me wanting to dive deeper in this subject.

title: React - The Complete Guide (Maximilian Schwarzm√ºller @Udemy.com)
description: I heard about this thing *React* and wanted to know what is was and what it did, so I did. I learned about *components* (both class and functional), *hooks*, *front-end* *routing*, and a lot more. It made me understand the react basics, and why it is so broadly used.

title: MERN Stack Front To Back: Full Stack React, Redux and Node.js
description: This course consisted mainly of building a social media application. Starting out with the backend API, creating protected routes, and then moving on to the front-end (react). I also learned how to deal with asynchronous code.

title: Vue JS - The Complete Guide (incl. Vue Router and Vuex
